main event: A very large bright orange-red light was observed by the crew of a Pan American Airlines flight traveling from Tokyo to Honolulu over the Pacific Ocean.
interesting points: The light was first seen approximately 200 miles west of Midway Island,It appeared stationary for 5 to 10 minutes before moving erratically in different directions,The pilot estimated the object's distance to be 10 to 15 miles from the aircraft,The light would suddenly disappear and then reappear nearby,After about 20 minutes, the light suddenly disappeared and did not reappear.
witness description: crew of a Pan American Airlines flight
